search.js: var elements = document.querySelectorAll('tbody tr a[href]'); for(var i = 0; i < elements.length; i++) {  var elem = elements[i];  var href = elem.getAttribute('href');  if (href.startsWith('/torrent')) {    href = 'https://thepiratebay.org/' + href;    elem.setAttribute('href', href);  }}; var ee = document.querySelectorAll('font.detDesc');for (var i = 0 ;i < ee.length;i++) {  var e = ee[i];  var h = e.innerHTML.replace(/ /ig, ' ');  e.innerHTML = h;}
search.title: a.detLink:regex(]*>(.*))
